Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...Farm management is more...intricate
than I had expected.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
O-oh! Good day, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What am I doing? N-nothing! Nothing at all...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
All right! All right! I'll tell you, just stop staring at
me like that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I was...reading a guidebook on farm
management.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ever since...what happened, I've been seeing
farms and how they operate in a different light.
<PAGE>
I am not leaving all of the labor to my servants.
Every once in a while, I will plant a few seeds, or
perhaps water them.
<PAGE>
I thought it would be nothing but filthy,
exhausting drudgery, but it's actually rather
amusing.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That made me want to try a few other things for
myself.
<PAGE>
But I'm not sure what to do next, nor how to do
it. Hence, the book.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I know it's beginner work, and I know it's silly of
me not to know it already. Laugh at my expense
if you must.
Try asking your servants.
Want me to teach you?
Bwa ha ha ha!!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes, I know they would most likely tell me all
that I would need to know...
<PAGE>
But as mistress of the manor and owner of this
farm, I mustn't act incompetent or un-
knowledgeable where the staff can see.
<PAGE>
It is my duty to set a proper example for them in
all things.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_L>Oh, I know! What if you were to teach me,
<MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You are a capable farmer well versed in common
chores. And I am certain you'll be discreet.
<PAGE>
More than that, aiding me is your responsibility,
as you were the one who opened my eyes to all
this in the first place.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
You will, of course, shoulder that responsibility
as any proper adult would, and teach me all I
need to know...RIGHT?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Excellent. Let's begin. First, I have a question
about what the book mentions here...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
There! You've given me a much clearer picture of
this whole affair. Excellent!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
If anything else confuses me, I will, of course,
require your further services.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>So, er...<MYNAME>? Umm...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>Thank you...for helping me.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, I must excuse myself and see to my
chores.
<PAGE>
Please say not one word of this to any of my
servants. Understand?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_FLAME_L><FACE_LAUGH>OR ELSE.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
My! You will? To be honest, there were several
places in the book which confused me.
<PAGE>
If you would be so kind as to help me with
them, I would very much appreciate it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! But please be discreet amongst the staff,
won't you?
<PAGE>
As mistress of the manor and owner of this
farm, I cannot appear incompetent or un-
knowledgeable where they can see.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I-I cannot believe you actually laughed at me.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_ANGER_L><FACE_ANGRY>I am trying, in my own way, to study and
mature as a proper lady, you know!
<PAGE>
If you would stand around and make a fool of
me, then I must ask you to leave!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
And here I thought you'd be kind enough to
assist me. Honestly! How low can you possibly
sink?
